titles.mainH1: Donations for X-country trails made easy
titles.error: There is no maintained track over here.

text.introLinePNB: List of non profit and volunteer groups with their payment details to support them for their maintanance work on grooming cross-country trails around Czechia.
text.introLineKosile: Thisi is a non profit website. Support further updates and the author by purchasing a premium, czech handmade shirt on <1>košile Od Uhlíře</1>, which myself as author, I'm producing.
text.introLineKZS: What is a current state of tracks and snow? Find out at partner web <1>www.kamzasnehem.cz</1>.
text.aboutLine1: You can go for cross-country ski trip almost for free, it costs nothing to enjoy the trail.
text.aboutLine2: Tracks are groomed and maintained by various clubs and non-profits with help of donations from civic collections and state contributions.
text.aboutLine3: I made this nonprofit web to make contributions and donations easy and simple.
text.aboutLine4: There are only trails listed I found a bank account number or a Facebook webpage for.
text.madeBy: This non-profit web was created by <1>Vojtěch Uhlíř</1>, a sportman, a x-country skier and a software engineer.
text.alsoMade:
Do you know improvisation, improv shows and standups? Check out <1>www.improbox.cz!
Web that is hub of Czech improv scene which I also made.
text.footerLine2: Is there something wrong or missing?
text.footerLine3: Write me and get in touch! ✍️
